name: openvto-monorepo
description: Open-source toolkit for building studio-quality virtual try-ons with generative AI
author: Prompt Haus

scripts.api: cd apps/api && . venv/bin/activate && API_KEY=openvto-dev GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=$(pwd)/vertex-runner-service-account-key.json python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.api:install: cd apps/api && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.sdk:install: cd packages/sdk && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -e '.[dev]'
